mapper.sql: t_comp_traffic_achievement.money as money, t_comp_traffic_achievement.id as compTrafficAchievementId, t_comp_traffic_achievement.comp_id as compTrafficAchievementCompId, t_comp_traffic_achievement.project_name as compTrafficAchievementProjectName, t_comp_traffic_achievement.name as compTrafficAchievementName, t_comp_traffic_achievement.technology_name as compTrafficAchievementTechnologyName, t_comp_traffic_achievement.contract_amount as compTrafficAchievementContractAmount, t_comp_traffic_achievement.work_addr as compTrafficAchievementWorkAddr, t_comp_traffic_achievement.start_date as compTrafficAchievementStartDate, t_comp_traffic_achievement.end_date as compTrafficAchievementEndDate, t_comp_traffic_achievement.valid_status as compTrafficAchievementValidStatus, t_comp_traffic_achievement.version as compTrafficAchievementVersion, t_comp_traffic_achievement.create_time as compTrafficAchievementCreateTime, t_comp_traffic_achievement.update_time as compTrafficAchievementUpdateTime, t_comp_traffic_achievement.is_active as compTrafficAchievementIsActive, t_company.comp_type as companyCompType, t_company.industry_type as companyIndustryType, t_company.comp_name as companyCompName
mapper.select:
select
from t_comp_traffic_achievement, t_company where t_comp_traffic_achievement.id = #{id} and t_comp_traffic_achievement.comp_id = t_company.id

select
from t_comp_traffic_achievement, t_company where t_comp_traffic_achievement.comp_id = t_company.id order by t_comp_traffic_achievement.update_time desc, t_comp_traffic_achievement.create_time desc

select
from t_comp_traffic_achievement, t_company
order by
${query.sortColumn} ${query.sortOrder}
t_comp_traffic_achievement.update_time desc, t_comp_traffic_achievement.create_time desc
